Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Votes.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Title: Amends chapter 465 of the laws of 1994 relating to fees for the New York botanical garden; repealer
Summary: Relates to fees for the New York Botanical Garden.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 465 of the laws of 1994, amending chapter 285 of the laws of 1891 relating to charging a fee for admission to the New York Botanical Garden, in relation to extending certain provisions authorizing the imposition of a required fee; and to repeal section 2 of such chapter
